input.sentences: the canadians stood proud in the american streets !
they went on strike and decided that unless they got more money | they would n't distribute maple syrup .
this caused a huge commotion within congress . they had to make a decision .
they decided to give more money to canadians in exchange for their maple syrup .
output.sentences: A Canadian flag stood proudly on the street.
The syrup factory workers were on strike to demand more money.
The country waited breathlessly for word of Congress' huge decision.
While the syrup factory workers were striking to demand more money, the maple sap sat in huge vats on the factory floor.
After hearing about their win, the workers celebrated their victory at an offsite location.
